ranks: # HERE SPECIFY rank ids from aotd_rank_data.csv, seperator for each rank is  ","
rank_threshold:
# map of points needed for rank , order it ascending and it should look like this: 
rank1:400,rank2:600,rank3:700
iconMap:
# map of icons displayed for each stage , if left unchecked it will show faction crest (NOTE IT MUST BE ID UNDER CATEGORY "Aotd ranks" specify that in your settings.json under "graphics" , example :
rank1:icon_id_1,rank2:icon_id_2,rank3:icon_id_3
commisionPlugin: # Here you can specify your own plugin , it must extend AoTDCommIntelPlugin, if its not specified it will use default plugin with data specified in spec !

ranks: cadet, ensign, l_commander, commodore, rear_admiral, vice_admiral, sub_s_admiral
rank_threshold: cadet:0, ensign:250, l_commander:500, commodore:750, rear_admiral:850, vice_admiral:1200, sub_s_admiral:1700

ranks: intern, agent, senior_agent, manager, senior_manager, junior_executive, high_executive
rank_threshold: intern:0, agent:250, senior_agent:500, manager:750, senior_manager:850, junior_executive:1200, high_executive:1700

ranks: powder_monkey, ravager, pirate_boss, galactic_pillager, void_reaver_captain, tyrant_overlord, abyssal_dreadking
rank_threshold: powder_monkey:0, ravager:250, pirate_boss:500, galactic_pillager:750, void_reaver_captain:1200, tyrant_overlord:1700, abyssal_dreadking:2200

ranks: retinue, corsair, void_scarred, oath_sworn, felarch, baron, prince
rank_threshold: retinue:0, corsair:250, void_scarred:500, oath_sworn:750, felarch:850, baron:1200, prince:1700

ranks: conscript, lieutenant, captain, lord_admiral, lord_governor, vice_leader, vice_supreme_leader
rank_threshold: conscript:0, lieutenant:250, captain:500, lord_admiral:750, lord_governor:850, vice_leader:1200, vice_supreme_leader:1700

ranks: frater, missionary, confessor, cardinal, cardinal_palatine, deacon, arch_deacon
rank_threshold: frater:0, missionary:250, confessor:500, cardinal:750, cardinal_palatine:850, deacon:1200, arch_deacon:1700
ceithearn:0, fianna:250, redshank:500, hobelar:750, gallowglass:1200, brigadier:1700, adjutant_general:2200
